Uses of Package
com.orchestranetworks.service.directory

Packages that use com.orchestranetworks.service.directory
com.orchestranetworks.instance Provides interfaces for accessing data sets. 
com.orchestranetworks.service Provides classes and interfaces for implementing specific services and access rules on EBX5. 
com.orchestranetworks.service.directory Provides classes for Directory handling. 
 

Classes in com.orchestranetworks.service.directory used by com.orchestranetworks.instance
AuthenticationException
           
 

Classes in com.orchestranetworks.service.directory used by com.orchestranetworks.service
DirectoryHandler
          An instance of this class wraps the current custom directory implementation, so as to add pre-processing and post-verifications to the directory method implementations.
 

Classes in com.orchestranetworks.service.directory used by com.orchestranetworks.service.directory
AuthenticationException
           
Directory
          Defines the user directory used by EBX5 for user authentication and roles management.
DirectoryDefault
          The default internal directory implementation that is delivered with EBX5.
DirectoryFactory
          Factory for the user and roles directory.
DirectoryHandler
          An instance of this class wraps the current custom directory implementation, so as to add pre-processing and post-verifications to the directory method implementations.
ProfileListContext
          This class is used by a user and roles directory to customize the profiles that a user can select.
